Class WildDrawFourCard

java.lang.Object
Card
ColorWildCard
WildDrawFourCard
public class WildDrawFourCard
extends ColorWildCard
The WildDrawFourCard class is a subclass of ColorWildCard that implements a type of card in Uno game when a user put this card he/she can choose a color of card that next players should play with and next player should pick up four cards or put WildDrawFour if he/she has one the score of this card is 50 points
Since:
4/14/2020
